name: Cinemare
description:
You're a ticket seller in a cinema.

Before the start of the film, you have to sell as many customers as possible the ticket they order. 

Unfortunately, ghosts constantly mingle in the queue and ask for tickets. 
Since ghost money is not real you have to scare them away with a crucifix.

Day 1 is easy, but the ghosts get harder to spot every night.
The goal is to achieve the highest possible score. Feel free to post it in the comments below.

Controls:

Sell red tickets with "S", blue tickets with "A" and scare away ghosts with "D". 
You can also click on the buttons with the mouse.

This game was developed within a week for Brackeys Game Jam 7 with the theme "It is not real".

Programming: https://der-kekser.itch.io/
Graphic design: https://carryzilla.itch.io/
